TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceContainer extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer, class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class ServiceContainer Implements IDisposable, IServiceContainer
type ServiceContainer = class interface IServiceContainer interface IDisposable interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: 提供 介面的簡單實作。

span.span: Provides a simple implementation of the interface.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件可以用來儲存，並提供服務。The object can be used to store and provide services. 會實作 介面。 implements the interface. 物件可以使用 加入父代的建構函式來建立透過哪些服務可以選擇性地加入或移除從所有的父代物件，包括直屬父。The object can be created using a constructor that adds a parent through which services can be optionally added to or removed from all parent objects, including the immediate parent . 若要新增或移除服務，從所有實作連結至這親子照顧，透過呼叫或方法多載可接受布林值，指出是否要升級的服務要求.To add or remove a service from all implementations that are linked to this through parenting, call the or method overload that accepts a Boolean value indicating whether to promote the service request. > [!NOTE] > 屬性套用至這個類別具有下列屬性值： 。The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不會影響桌面應用程式 (這些應用程式的啟動方式一般都是按兩下圖示、輸入命令或在瀏覽器輸入 URL)。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 類別或[SQL Server 程式設計和主機保護屬性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下列範例程式會示範服務鏈結和結果的服務可用性的一連串連結物件。The following example program demonstrates service chaining and the resultant service availability of a chain of linked objects. 該方案提供的使用者介面，可讓您查看連結的服務的鏈結中的服務可用性，並使用， ，和方法，以及連結的服務容器。The program provides a user interface that allows you to see the availability of services within a chain of linked services, and uses the , , and methods as well as linked service containers. [!code-cpp[ServiceArchitectureExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ServiceArchitectureExample/CPP/serviceform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceArchitectureExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ServiceArchitectureExample/CS/serviceform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceArchitectureExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ServiceArchitectureExample/VB/serviceform.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務容器會使用此服務物件提供者來擷取服務，如果它們不在本機容器中。The service container uses this service object provider to retrieve services, if they are not available locally in the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回預設服務直接在此實作。This property returns the default services that are implemented directly on this . 這個屬性的預設實作會傳回和型別。the default implementation of this property is to return the and types. 您可以覆寫這個屬性，並傳回您自己的型別中，然後再修改的預設行為。You may override this property and return your own types, modifying the default behavior of .

span.span: Disposes this service container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將逐步引導容器內的所有具現化的服務，並處置任何實作，並清除 [服務] 清單。 walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement , and clears the service list. 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

Disposes this service container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將逐步引導容器內的所有具現化的服務，並處置任何實作，並清除 [服務] 清單。 walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement , and clears the service list. 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
